pages.text: Some experienced botanists might find themselves not satisfied with default good old flora. That's how they came up with mana liquidizer.$(br2)This fancy device can generate mana out of special mana liquid inside: just plug a spreader to it, fill the buffer with liquid and point spreader to mana storage; liquidizer will convert mana liquid into ephemeral mana automatically.
There is various ways to generate mana fluid, check the JEI.
